description: Retrieves total and available balances for all assets at a specific connection.

pathParameters.name: connection_id
pathParameters.description: This path parameter, a string in UUID format, serves to identify the specific connection relevant to the current operation.

queryParameters.name: currency
queryParameters.description: Specifies the symbol of the currency related to the current operation (e.g., "BTC")

queryParameters.name: counterparty_type
queryParameters.description: Specifies the type of a particular connection -- "EXCHANGE", "CUSTODY", "OTC", or "BANK" -- relevant to the current operation.

description: Retrieves the trade balance for a specific asset at a particular connection (counterparty).

pathParameters.name: connection_id
pathParameters.description: This path parameter, a string in UUID format, serves to identify the specific connection relevant to the current operation.

queryParameters.name: currency
queryParameters.description: Specifies the symbol of the currency related to the current operation (e.g., "BTC")

queryParameters.name: counterparty_type
